history.proof: intros. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rbar_is_glb_unique. qsimpl time: 2 use: Rbar_is_glb_unique. qsimpl time: 2 use: iff_sym,Rbar_is_glb_unique. qsimpl time: 2 use: iff_sym,Rbar_is_glb_unique. qsimpl time: 2 use: iff_sym,Rbar_is_glb_unique. qsimpl time: 2 use: iff_sym,Rbar_is_glb_unique. qauto use: Rbar_is_lb_subset, Rbar_le_antisym.

original: intros H1 H2 H3 H4. apply Rbar_is_glb_unique. split. - intros x Ex. specialize (H2 x). apply iff_sym, H1, H2. - intros b Hb. apply iff_sym, H1. apply H3. intros x Ex. apply iff_sym, H1, Hb, Ex.
